name: Call Center Sim
description:
CALL CENTER SIM

  • Hire Agents - these are the boys and girls who can make you a fortune, or get your call center closed down for good. New ways to hire unlock as you progress.
  • Train them - John might be a hit with the ladies on Facebook, but if he's going to sell money to Bankers, he'll need a few tips. New training techniques unlock as you progress.
  • Earn money - Even the most basic agents can get a sale but the very best will sell a lot on every call.
  • Expand your call center - You can't keep using your parents garden shed forever. It's free but has limited space. Be careful you don't expand too fast!

I made this game a long time ago with GameMaker 1.4 for android. I figured that some people might find it interesting :)
